{\"input\": \"Who is Akhil\"}.response: Akhil Singh Rana is a Senior Machine Learning Engineer with extensive experience in Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning, Computer Vision, Deep Learning, Generative AI, Remote Sensing, and Earth Observation. He has worked on various projects, including developing a Change Detection product to update Corine Land Cover and Land Use classes using self-supervised learning models, and creating multi-modal models for spatio-temporal Earth Observation data.

{\"input\": \"Tell me about Akhil\"}.response:
Based on the provided documents, I found information about two individuals named Akhil. 

Akhil Singh Rana is a Senior Machine Learning Engineer with extensive experience in Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning, and Computer Vision. He has worked on various projects, including developing a Change Detection product and creating multi-modal models for spatio-temporal Earth Observation data.

Akhil Akkineni, on the other hand, is an Indian actor who primarily appears in South Indian films. He made his acting debut in 2015 with the movie Akhil: The Power of Jua and is the son of Indian actor Akkineni Nagarjuna and Amala Akkineni.
